name: DEPTH (itch) (todorrobot)
description:
V1
WASD or ARROWS to move

V2
SPACE for psychic powers

V3
SPACE+DIR for multitool

My Submission for the Triple Tri-jam -- Three versions of one game, three hours each, three themes: Deep Waters, Sixth Sense, Multi-purpose Tool, but I think I messed up the deadline times, because I thought it was 5:00 PM UTC (which is 6 PM for me, but I was certainly not done this morning at 5AM. Darn!). 

Got this done within the 9 hours. Version 2 took longer than I wanted, so Version 3 is incomplete. I tried to work in all three themes too, but again - 9 hours is not much time and I'm happy I made it as far as I did. 

Looking forward to checking out all the other entries. Please leave a comment and let me know what you think!
